name: Dead Panda Countdown
author: Evgen "EvgenDob" Dobrzhanskiy

sections.description:
The plugin patching countdown-data from http://projectpanda.net/. The plugin shows how often a panda gets killed and encourages users to take action. If you decide to do so, you will come to a page that has listed several sites where you can donate money or other things to help the pandas.

To see how the plugin look like, please visit http://projectpanda.net/how-can-i-help/.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to your website and then activate it.
  2. Either use the plugin as a widget or use the shortcode [panda_countdown] on either a page or a post.

short_description: This plugin can you have on your website to spread the word and stop the poachers of pandas.
